Package main

Class Order

java.lang.Object
main.Order
public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
The class Order provides a concrete implementation for a Order object An Order object represents a food order by a given customer, from a given restaurant, to be delivered by a given driver
Author:
donnp

    • Order

      public Order​(int orderNumber, java.lang.String specialInstructions, Customer customer, Restaurant restaurant, Driver driver)
      Overloaded constructor
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - int unique orderId
      specialInstructions - String specifying if there are any special instructions for the meal
      customer - Customer object representing the Customer for this Order
      restaurant - Restaurant object representing the Restaurant for this Order
      driver - Driver object representing the Driver who will deliver this Order

    • Order

      public Order​(int orderNumber, java.lang.String specialInstructions, Customer customer, Restaurant restaurant, Driver driver, boolean isComplete, java.lang.String dateString)
      Overloaded constructor
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - int unique orderId
      specialInstructions - String specifying if there are any special instructions for the meal
      customer - Customer object representing the Customer for this Order
      restaurant - Restaurant object representing the Restaurant for this Order
      driver - Driver object representing the Driver who will deliver this Order
      isComplete - boolean true if order is complete, false otherwise
      dateString - Date date on which order was completed
